description: This programme covers all UN's support to Government of Papua New Guinea on climate change.

subproject.description: The UN Collaborative Programme on Reducing Emissions from Deforestation & Forest Degradation in Developing Countries (UN-REDD) was created to assist developing countries to build capacity to reduce emissions & to participate in a future REDD+ mechanism.
